attributes.action: Creation of a Post Office Bank
attributes.additional_details:
I call on the Government and Postal Affairs Minister (Mr. Davey) in particular to reconsider their decision NOT to create a Post Bank from the current network of Post Offices.
With the current problem of getting banks to lend to Businesses and the lack of trust for banks the Post Office could provide a natural solution to this problem and provide much needed work for the network of Post Office branches thereby helping to secure the future of this National Asset!
